title: Mobster
description: Can’t get enough of Kingpin Series? You’re in luck! The story continues with a bonus novella on Emma and Giovanni.  Find out if their quick love story is the icing on the Kingpin cake!  Author Note: This story was originally added to the back of Kingpin, so you may have read it before. Due to formatting guidelines, we are releasing these bonus chapters separately. Enjoy!
author: Alexa Riley
